person.persName: Alexander Campbell Ellis (Kenton County, Kentucky, deputy circuit clerk)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, circuit court clerk. Kenton County native. Son of William G. Ellis and Susan Arnold Ellis. Married to Kate Blackburn Hereford Ellis in Fleming County on July 8, 1850. Step-father to Mary Hereford, Maria Hereford, and Kate Hereford. Father of Sallie Ellis, Wade H. Ellis, and Woodford L. Ellis. Taught school and headed a private school in Bourbon County. Deputy clerk of the Kenton Circuit Court in Kenton County from 1856 to 1865. Appointed commissioner of public schools in 1858. Admitted to the bar in 1862. Clerk of the Kenton Circuit Court in Kenton County from 1865 to 1866. Member of the Board of School Examiners for Covington beginning in 1865. Member of Disciples of Christ church.
